description: Detects the addition of a rule to the Windows Firewall exception list where the application resides in a suspicious folder
author: frack113
false_positives: Any legitimate application that runs from the AppData user directory
name: New Firewall Exception Rule Added For A Suspicious Folder
query: (((winlog.event_id:("2004" OR "2071") AND ApplicationPath:(*\\AppData\\* OR *\\Temp\\*)) AND (NOT Action:"2")) AND (NOT ((ApplicationPath:*\\AppData\\local\\microsoft\\teams\\current\\teams.exe) OR (ApplicationPath:*\\AppData\\Local\\Keybase\\keybase.exe) OR (ApplicationPath:*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Messenger\\Messenger.exe) OR ((ApplicationPath:C\:\\Users\\* AND ApplicationPath:*\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Opera\\* AND ApplicationPath:*\\opera.exe)))))
